name: EZ360 VR video player
detailed_description:
EZ360 combines an automatic 360° video player with remote video distribution. This allows you to distribute videos to headsets all over the world without the need to manually transfer video files to the computer.

The EZ360 Cloud application automatically downloads new videos that have been uploaded from the online portal. When the download is complete you can watch the video in the video player, even when offline. Playing a video is fully automatic. The video starts automatically when you put on a headset and when the headset is taken off, the video stops. This removes the hassle that other video players bring by providing a much easier interface.

Videos can be uploaded online to your own EZ360 account. The VR-headsets download videos automatically with the correct settings. You can upload 2 GB of video content and connect 2 VR-headsets to your account for free, you can upgrade to a paid plan.

Features
- Ultra user friendly
- Mono + Stereoscopic 360 videos
- 2D regular videos
- 180 videos
- Spatial Audio (.tbe)
- .MP4 Video format
- Add custom logo, background and video thumbnails
- Much more..
